ai-tha-ap345:3.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap345:3.4_0: And I am a wheel-turning monarch.

ai-tha-ap345:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap345:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bharadvāja.
